title: FK Željezničar Doboj
text: Fudbalski klub Željezničar Doboj (<a href="Serbian%20Cyrillic%20alphabet">Serbian Cyrillic</a>: Фудбалски клуб Жeљeзничap Дoбoj) is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Doboj">Doboj</a>, <a href="Republika%20Srpska">Republika Srpska</a>, <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>. meaning "railwayman" is a common name for sports clubs associated with railway workers.
